## MDS compliance

- [ ] No raw HTML interactive controls — all UI goes through `@ui`
- [ ] No hardcoded values — colors, spacing, and typography use MDS tokens
- [ ] Bower font used correctly (display sizes only, 44px+, weight 500/700)
- [ ] Tables do not use `display: flex` or `display: grid` in cells
- [ ] Data visualisation uses solid colors only (no gradients)
- [ ] Output has been visually checked against MDS guidelines
